creator: rggb
title: Human Powered Night Train
materials_required: 4'x8' tandem axle 3/4 ton flatbed cargo trailer
description: This project details the construction of a human-powered parade float in the form of a night train, designed for a Christmas parade. It utilizes a tandem recumbent tricycle, a flatbed cargo trailer, and a kid's wagon as its base, with added superstructure and lighting to create the train effect.
steps: Start with a base platform consisting of a human-powered tandem recumbent tricycle.
Attach a home-made 4'x8' tandem axle 3/4 ton flatbed cargo trailer to the tricycle for towing.
Connect a kid's wagon to the cargo trailer.
Ensure the tricycle is positioned entirely underneath the bottom locomotive boiler line.
Add a superstructure to create the locomotive appearance.
Integrate 130m of 2.5mm electro-luminescent wire (red, green, and blue) for lighting.
Install a real diesel locomotive air horn.
